content:
{"name": "Daily Table Roxbury", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Apply online at" https://mymdthink.maryland.gov/home/#/sunbucks
Online: Apply for SNAP benefits online at DTAConnect.com.
Call: DTA Assistance Line: 877-382-2363 (press 7 to apply for SNAP) The DTA Assistance Line is open from 8:15 A.M. to 4:45 P.M. Monday - Friday.
Mail: Download the SNAP benefits application in your primary language https://www.mass.gov/resource/dta-documents-forms. For individuals and couples age 60 or older, you can use the SNAP application for seniors https://www.mass.gov/doc/english-snap-application-for-seniors-snap-app-seniors-0/download. 
Download the DTA cover sheet https://www.mass.gov/doc/dta-mailfax-cover-sheet/download
Mail the completed cover sheet and application to: DTA Document Processing Center P.O. Box 4406 Taunton, MA 02780
https://www.mass.gov/how-to/supplemental-nutrition-assistance-program-snap-formerly-known-as-food-stamps", "email": "", "url": "https://www.dailytable.org/locations", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2201 Washington Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Roxbury", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02119", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3311587, "longitude": -71.08325049999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 989-6000", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}]}
